body: Hi. I've created a building manually, with levels and windows. I turned the geometry into honeybee zones, created the windows with Add glazing tool and now I'm trying to simulate it, but i get this error message: Solution exception:'EPZone' object has no attribute 'cenPt' geometry. When I try to simulate a simple geometry, just for test, it runs. Can anyone help me?[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/DLsMNj26FUXqND5xt7RfRHw6qTYxBCjWbXgYwPmy4L0gNEalj4ZA3hUpLl8ASfmYq6EQFsuXFC-Yn7w4hLjxu3*Wj9l*HjtH/Semttulo.png)
topic: Simulation error: 'EPZone' object has no attribute 'cenPt' geometry
